title: Does the Internet have a soul? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Internet does not have a soul. It is electromagnetic waves and such. But computer workers, from call center techs to AI/VR comp sci Ph.D.’s, do have souls (although some of them, especially at the grad schooled level, may not know this). Clifford Stoll: "Data is not information, information is not knowledge, knowledge is not understanding, and understanding is not wisdom."
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Reginald Cristofer Rogoff

response.answer_text: Accorded to ‘WIRED’ The battle for the soul of the internet has well and truly begun The western principle of a free internet that's open to anyone is the very thing that's being used to undermine liberal democracy.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Reginald Cristofer Rogoff
